snippet: What is being paraded as street style — once fashion’s last stronghold of true indie spirit — has been breached, infiltrated by tides of branding consultants and public relations gurus.
abstract: Many strikingly dressed fashion bloggers pounding the pavement during New York Fashion Week are stealthily marketing clothes from major labels and brands, trend that is subverting the true indie spirit of street style.
lead_paragraph: What is being paraded as street style — once fashion’s last stronghold of true indie spirit — has been breached, infiltrated by tides of branding consultants and public relations gurus.

headline.seo: New York Fashion Week Street Style Is Often a Billboard for Brands
headline.main: Who Am I Wearing? Funny You Should Ask.
headline.print_headline: Who Am I Wearing? Funny You Should Ask.
